scripts.lint: php -r "\$errors = false; foreach(glob('Resources/*.json') as \$file) { \$data = file_get_contents(\$file); @json_decode(\$data); if (json_last_error() !== JSON_ERROR_NONE) { \$errors = true; echo PHP_EOL . 'Invalid localization file: ' . \$file . PHP_EOL . json_last_error_msg() . PHP_EOL . PHP_EOL; } } if (!\$errors) echo PHP_EOL . 'All localization files are valid.' . PHP_EOL . PHP_EOL; "
